CustomField.description: If the consumer requests deletion of their personal information in the initial request, they acknowledge that said operation is permanent and cannot be reversed. We must separately re-confirm after identify verification that they still want to delete. That is not the purpose of this checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the consumer requests deletion of their personal information in the initial request, they acknowledge that said operation is permanent and cannot be reversed. We must separately re-confirm after identify verification that they still want to delete.
CustomField.label: Deletion Irreversible Acknowledgement
